org.vertx.java.core.streams

Interface ReadSupport<T,M>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExceptionSupport<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsyncFile, DatagramSocket, HttpClientResponse, HttpServerFileUpload, HttpServerRequest, NetSocket, ReadStream<T>, ServerWebSocket, SockJSSocket, WebSocket, WebSocketBase<T>

    public interface ReadSupport<T,M>
extends ExceptionSupport<T>
    Allows to set a Handler which is notified once data was read. It also allows to pause reading and resume later.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T dataHandler(Handler<M> handler)
      Set a data handler.
      T pause()
      Pause the ReadSupport.
      T resume()
      Resume reading.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.vertx.java.core.streams.ExceptionSupport

        exceptionHandler

    • Method Detail

      • dataHandler

        T dataHandler(Handler<M> handler)
        Set a data handler. As data is read, the handler will be called with the data.

      • pause

        T pause()
        Pause the ReadSupport. While it's paused, no data will be sent to the dataHandler

      • resume

        T resume()
        Resume reading. If the ReadSupport has been paused, reading will recommence on it.
